mapper.select: SELECT exam_time.id, exam_time.exam_id, exam_time.exam_time, exam_time.create_time, exam_time.update_time FROM exam INNER JOIN exam_time ON exam.id = exam_time.exam_id WHERE exam.id = #{examId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT exam_place.id, exam_place.exam_time_id, exam_place.exam_place, exam_place.create_time, exam_place.update_time FROM exam_time INNER JOIN exam_place ON exam_time.id = exam_place.exam_time_id

SELECT exam.id, exam.title, exam.description, exam.detail, exam.image_url, exam.begin_time, exam.end_time, exam.price, exam.create_time, exam.update_time, exam_time.id AS exam_time_id, exam_time.exam_time, exam_place.id AS exam_place_id, exam_place.exam_place, exam_place.people_number FROM exam INNER JOIN exam_time ON exam.id = exam_time.exam_id INNER JOIN exam_place ON exam_time.id = exam_place.exam_time_id WHERE exam.id = #{examId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND exam_time.id = #{examTimeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND exam_place.id = #{examPlaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
